import {React, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from "react-redux" import {Container, Button, Row, Col, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" import SingleItem from '../components/SingleItem' import {FaArrowRight} from "react-icons/fa" function HomePage({items}) { const [headerItems, setHeaderItems] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { let newArr = [...items] const biggestDiscounts = newArr.filter(x => x.discount === true).sort((a, b) => (b.withoutDiscount - b.price) - (a.withoutDiscount - a.price)).splice(0, 3) setHeaderItems(biggestDiscounts) console.log(biggestDiscounts) },[]) return (

Check out our hottest deals!

{headerItems && headerItems.map((x, i ) => )}

SEE ALL

 ) } export default HomePage
